entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 6:37 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
